scenario.name: Mobicents SIP Presence Internal Publisher Subcriber
scenario.send: SUBSCRIBE sip:[field0]@[remote_ip] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: subscriber[call_number] <sip:subscriber[call_number]@[local_ip]>;tag=[call_number] To: [field0] <sip:[field0]@[remote_ip]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 SUBSCRIBE Contact: sip:subscriber[call_number]@[local_ip]:[local_port] Max-Forwards: 70 Expires: 3600 Event: presence Accept: application/pidf+xml Content-Length: 0
